title: 【搬运贴】禁用Endermen移动方块mod
author: asd273365987
txt_content: 使用方法:把文件移入minecraft.jar.删除META-INF

replies.author: asd273365987
replies.txt_content: 新人第一次搬运,翻译得不好请见谅...

replies.author: [我吃饭]
replies.txt_content: 不错的东西，这样困难就无压力了

replies.author: asd273365987
replies.txt_content: 是么...布吉岛也....只是看到这个mod不错就发了.

replies.author: asd273365987
replies.txt_content:
green丶bastard 发表于 2011-9-17 17:19

斑竹大大要删贴?

replies.txt_content: 不删 要删早删了 以后注意了

replies.author: asd273365987
replies.txt_content: 谢谢,以后我会继续上搬运贴的.
